name: Seed of a Fruit Strange and Divine
desc: When an ally target deals "Aftertaste" DMG to any enemy target, increases the ally target's DMG dealt by 12%, stacking up to 4 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
enhanced_desc: When an ally target deals "Aftertaste" DMG to any enemy target, increases the ally target's DMG dealt by 12%, stacking up to 6 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
